name: Vileplume ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Block Dust
poke_body.effect: As long as Vileplume ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can’t play any Trainer cards (except for Supporter cards) from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Special Formula
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
